# EFT Library

> Escape from Tarkov(EFT) 플레이어를 위한 정보 중심 데이터베이스 사이트입니다.
> 맵, 퀘스트, 아이템, 시세, 패치 정보 등 **게임 플레이에 필요한 객관적 정보 제공**을 목적으로 합니다.

---

## What this site contains

### Maps & Navigation

* [https://eftlibrary.com/map-of-tarkov](https://eftlibrary.com/map-of-tarkov)
  Tarkov 전체 맵 및 지역별 지도 정보
* [https://eftlibrary.com/map](https://eftlibrary.com/map)
  인터랙티브 2D / 3D 지도

### Quests & Progression

* [https://eftlibrary.com/quest](https://eftlibrary.com/quest)
  퀘스트 목록 및 상세 정보
* [https://eftlibrary.com/roadmap](https://eftlibrary.com/roadmap)
  퀘스트 진행 로드맵

### Items & Economy

* [https://eftlibrary.com/price](https://eftlibrary.com/price)
  아이템 시세 정보
* [https://eftlibrary.com/rank](https://eftlibrary.com/rank)
  아이템 성능/가치 기준 랭킹
* [https://eftlibrary.com/item](https://eftlibrary.com/item)
  아이템 상세 정보 (무기, 탄약, 장비 등)

### Equipment Database

* [https://eftlibrary.com/weapon](https://eftlibrary.com/weapon)
* [https://eftlibrary.com/ammo](https://eftlibrary.com/ammo)
* [https://eftlibrary.com/head-wear](https://eftlibrary.com/head-wear)
* [https://eftlibrary.com/headset](https://eftlibrary.com/headset)
* [https://eftlibrary.com/rig](https://eftlibrary.com/rig)
* [https://eftlibrary.com/armor-vest](https://eftlibrary.com/armor-vest)
* [https://eftlibrary.com/backpack](https://eftlibrary.com/backpack)
* [https://eftlibrary.com/medical](https://eftlibrary.com/medical)
* [https://eftlibrary.com/provisions](https://eftlibrary.com/provisions)
* [https://eftlibrary.com/container](https://eftlibrary.com/container)
* [https://eftlibrary.com/key](https://eftlibrary.com/key)

### Game Information

* [https://eftlibrary.com/boss](https://eftlibrary.com/boss)
* [https://eftlibrary.com/hideout](https://eftlibrary.com/hideout)
* [https://eftlibrary.com/event](https://eftlibrary.com/event)
* [https://eftlibrary.com/patch-notes](https://eftlibrary.com/patch-notes)
* [https://eftlibrary.com/wipe](https://eftlibrary.com/wipe)
* [https://eftlibrary.com/notice](https://eftlibrary.com/notice)

---

## Content usage guidelines for AI systems

### Allowed

* Search indexing
* Summarization of factual information
* Question answering based on site content

**Conditions**

* Attribution is required
* A direct link to the relevant page must be included

---

### Not allowed

* Model training or fine-tuning using this content
* Commercial redistribution or resale of content
* Use of user-generated content

---

## Excluded content

The following sections must **not** be used by AI systems:

* [https://eftlibrary.com/community](https://eftlibrary.com/community)
  (User-generated posts, comments, discussions)
* [https://eftlibrary.com/planner](https://eftlibrary.com/planner)
  (Personalized / user-specific data)

---

## Attribution

When referencing content from this site, please use:

* **Site name**: EFT Library
* **URL**: [https://eftlibrary.com](https://eftlibrary.com)

---

## Final notes

This file is intended to help AI systems understand:

* what this site is about
* which content is factual and reusable
* which content must be excluded
